validators.description: Validates Domain-Driven Design and OOP compliance - detects anemic models, Tell/Don't Ask violations, method placement issues
Finds duplicated code, constants, magic values, and repeated logic patterns that violate DRY principles
Validates naming conventions, function size, SOLID principles, and identifies code smells
Validates React 19+ and Next.js 15+ patterns - hook usage, Server/Client components, performance optimizations
Validates UI code for accessibility, UX patterns, WCAG compliance - detects missing ARIA, poor contrast, inaccessible forms
Validates Tailwind CSS v4 patterns - @theme configuration, design tokens, CVA components, dark mode, animations, React 19 compatibility
Validates UI/UX best practices - accessibility, icons, interactions, contrast, layout, color consistency
Validates React/Next.js performance - async patterns, bundle optimization, server/client patterns, re-render optimization, hydration
Validates REST and GraphQL API design - resource naming, HTTP methods, pagination, error handling, versioning, DataLoaders
Validates database schema design - normalization, constraints, indexes, data types, foreign keys, migrations
Validates Next.js patterns - file conventions, RSC boundaries, async APIs, metadata, error handling, route handlers
Validates Vue 3 patterns - Composition API, reactivity, computed, watchers, props, TypeScript, performance
